# Class: DistanceOutput

Output for Distance.

**`prop`** {Vec2} pointA closest point on shapeA

**`prop`** {Vec2} pointB closest point on shapeB

**`prop`** distance

**`prop`** iterations number of GJK iterations used

* **DistanceOutput**
